title: How to Make Mie Celor Special

steps.headline: First, sauté chopped garlic with vegetable oil until it become fragrant, then put the shrimp.
After that add 100 ml water, when it starts boiling, add lime juice, salt, pepper and sugar to your taste.
Add the coconut milk and let it boils again, then turn down the heat into low and keep stirring while pouring corn flour until the soup thicken and add pieces of leek and also fried onions.
Spoon noodle and bean sprouts into bowl, flush with hot sauce and add pieces of boiled egg.

text: First, sauté chopped garlic with vegetable oil until it become fragrant, then put the shrimp.  After that add 100 ml water, when it starts boiling, add lime juice, salt, pepper and sugar to your taste.  Add the coconut milk and let it boils again, then turn down the heat into low and keep stirring while pouring corn flour until the soup thicken and add pieces of leek and also fried onions.  Spoon noodle and bean sprouts into bowl, flush with hot sauce and add pieces of boiled egg. Serve it with sambal.
